title: [Gameplay] Tryndamere Rage
body:
When Tryndamere kills a Honeyfruit it builds up his rage bar. Also when he picks up the fruit from the ground it also builds his rage bar. is this intended?
Happens every game.

replies.body: Well you are dealing like -1 dmg to yourself when you pick up a honeyfruit, it's listed somewhere just to make things a bit easier, and yes honey fruits are like minions due to the coding nature of it mumbo jumbo. It's fine, although It'd be nice to not have {{champion:78}} passive activate on wards,plants, even though you get the shield for killing it or {{champion:37}} empowered attacks on them.
